INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Risk of decrease of the effect of the ulipristal, due to increase of its hepatic metabolism by the inducer
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Choose a therapeutic alternative that is little or not at all metabolized.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Risk of decrease of the effect of the ulipristal, due to decrease of its absorption
Risk of decrease of the effect of the ulipristal, due to decrease of its absorption
Risk of antagonism of the progestative effects
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Do not take a progestative treatment fewer than 12 hours after stopping the ulipristal.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Risk of antagonism of the effects of the estrogen-progestin contraceptive
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Do not restart the combined estrogen-progestin treatment fewer than 12 days after stopping the ulipristal.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Risk of decrease of the effect of the ulipristal, due to increase of its hepatic metabolism by the ritonavir
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Choose a therapeutic alternative that is little or not at all metabolised.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Risk of decrease of the effect of the ulipristal, due to increase of its hepatic metabolism by the inducer
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Choose a therapeutic alternative that is little or not at all metabolized.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Risk of antagonism of the effects of the progestin contraceptive
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Do not restart a progestin treatment fewer than 12 days after stopping the ulipristal.

CLASS.name: NON-CONTRACEPTIVE PROGESTOGENS, COMBINED WITH AN ESTROGEN OR NOT

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Risk of antagonism of the effects of the progestin contraceptive
INTERACTION.COMMENT: In an indication for uterine fibroids, do not restart a progestin treatment fewer than 12 days after the ulipristal is stopped.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Risk of decrease of the effect of the ulipristal, due to increase of its hepatic metabolism by the inducer
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Chose a therapeutic alternative that is little or not at all metabolized.
